milestones.title: All Q4 Roadmaps Published on github
milestones.description: Publish the Q4 Roadmaps for all IPFS-related projects.

milestones.title: Ratify New Project Management Model
milestones.description: This milestone will be done when the new PM model document is stable and ratified by all the IPFS-related projects and when all major IPFS-related Project Roadmaps conform to that New PM Model. See issues status at https://waffle.io/ipfs/pm?milestone=Implement%20New%20Project%20Management%20Model This work will allow us to use the roadmap-generator tool to generate consistently-formatted roadmaps. It will also allow us to assemble our first formal Organization Roadmap.

milestones.title: First Organization Roadmap
milestones.description: The organization roadmap gathers the roadmaps and milestones of all our projects into a consolidated view.

milestones.title: PM Process Implemented Across all IPFS Projects
milestones.description: This milestone will be done when all major IPFS-related Projects are using the Project Management model described in https://github.com/ipfs/pm/blob/master/drafts/Project%20Management%20Process.md
